alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 12:06AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1245 AM MST... At 1205 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estrella, or 15 miles northeast of Gila Bend, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Estrella, Freeman, Big Horn, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Bosque, Estrella Sailport, Sonoran National Monument, Mobile and Ak- Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 113 and 155. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 41. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 4, and between mile markers 119 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
